semantic.text: Out of the World Digital Experience

Established in 2009, we have served diverse clients from pharmaceuticals and automotive to tourism and government investment boards. Growing from roots in the digital industry, we understand the importance of intuitive and innovative technology in today’s world. And we have helped create a wave of profitable realities for numerous national and international brands.

We provide customized tech solutions that fulfill your brand’s unique purpose and elevate your business. Our creative and technical expertise is driven by design and led by strategy, and we are passionately motivated to serve all our customers with the best service.

The entire team of Amnil Tech was amazing from the start of our first meeting through the completion of each of our projects. All of this is through remote work. They are consistent, punctual, highly responsive, and always ready to help. We truly appreciate their dedication for over four years. They are efficient and a pleasure to work with.

My experience with Amnil Tech during my tenure at Nabil Bank and now in Lead Nepal has been of utmost delight. Amnil Tech's teams are extremely professional and highly knowledgeable. Their intuitive work allowed our vision to turn into a reality and helped us bridge the gap between us and our customers. I highly recommend Amnil team. Good luck!
Amnil Tech performs with impeccable professionalism. They are always ready to help. They designed and developed our website which matched our vision. Choosing Amnil Tech was a great choice for us.

We have been working with Amnil Tech for app support, monthly resource model, and DevOps role support. Working remotely, they have provided us with the utmost support and cooperation. They are highly capable and knowledgeable. Their customer support is probably one of the best in the market.

As a news portal, we have to make sure that our news and stories are updated at all times. Thanks to Amnil Tech’s prompt service and responsiveness to issues, our readers are always able to get their news instantly. From our website to our app, Amnil Tech has provided us with amazing results.

Our partnership with Amnil Tech has been going on strong for almost a decade now. They are a team of highly professional and knowledgeable individuals who have understood our business and translated into a highly effective information system. We highly recommend Amnil Technologies.

Let’s build better and grow together

Established in 2009, we have served diverse clients from pharmaceuticals and automotive to tourism and government investment boards. Growing from roots in the digital industry, we understand the importance of intuitive and innovative technology in today’s world. And we have helped create a wave of profitable realities for numerous national and international brands.

At Amnil Technologies, we believe in building a “from ground-up to the top” relationship with our clients and helping them at every step. And we aspire to serve quality, transparency, and commitment in everything we do.

At Amnil Tech, we are passionate about our work. We like to keep our process simple and transparent. And our team strives on creating best-in-class quality experiences for users. We aim for customer satisfaction in all stages of our work. From conception to implementation and ongoing maintenance, our ultimate goal is to provide impeccable customer service to all our clients.

We believe that open communication with honesty is crucial to good cooperation. We always welcome new suggestions. We love brainstorming new ideas and our clients are always open to expressing their concerns or solutions with us.

Cooperative, collegial, and creative - these words define our company culture. We pride ourselves on having different ideologies and sharing our ideas collaboratively and effectively. We believe in growing with the ever-changing market and we welcome suggestions from all our team and also our clients.

Customer transparency and reliability is the building block of our company’s value. We are ready to explain our processes and decisions anytime, ensuring that our clients are informed of our decisions. We value good communication every step of the way.
We understand the need for designs and technologies that are user-friendly and intuitive. Apart from creating stunning designs, our digital technologies are easy to use, simple, and effective.
Let’s build better and grow together

We provide customized tech solutions that fulfill your brand’s unique purpose and elevate your business. Our creative and technical expertise is driven by design and led by strategy, and we are passionately motivated to serve all our customers with the best service.
Let’s build better and grow together

As a PHP Developer you will be responsible for creating and implementing an array of Web- based products using PHP, MySQL, Ajax, and JavaScript. You will develop back-end components, connect the application with other web services, and assist front-end developers by ensuring their work integrates with the application.

items: Software development from the initial specification, through to developing, testing, and launching.
Work collaboratively with other developers in a multi-dev environment.
Modify existing software of PHP-based code.
Manage and improve performance of new and future software.
Should have the ability and wish to upgrade themself to other high end applications and BPM solutions as per requirements.
Bachelors in Computer Science, Engineering or any other relevant field.
Expertise in both Laravel as well as support level knowledge of codeigniter.
Good knowledge of SQL and related databases, with a preference for those with MySQL experience.
Excellent knowledge of the basic PHP 7 or web server exploits along with their solutions.
Experience building or maintaining a CMS.
A detailed understanding of database design and administration.
Proficiency when it comes to code versioning tools.
The ability to integrate a variety of data sources and databases into a single system.

semantic.text: As a quality assurance personnel you will be responsible for ensuring that products and services meet the established standards set by the company. Duties include maintaining strong overall quality control of products made by the company adhering to reliability, performance and customer expectation. Inspection of products is part of the job with the obligation to report and document findings.

items: Create detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured test plans and test cases.
Estimate, prioritize, plan, and coordinate testing activities.
Design, develop and execute automation scripts using open source tools such as Cypress, Selenium, etc.
Identify, record, document thoroughly, and track system defects.
Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved.
Perform software quality assurance, including black and white box testing, user acceptance testing, and maintenance regression testing.
Experienced in designing and executing performance tests using JMeter to assess application performance under various conditions..
Evaluate testing - and inspection plans for projects of varying technology, complexity, and size.
Develop, document, and maintain manual/automated test scripts, test cases, test data, defect tracking, and reports.
Review log files and other run-time documentation for defects and issues.
Analyze the results of software tests and provide results for use in development code inspections.
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or B.E. in Computer Engineering or related field.
Coding experience with Python, Java, and web-based technologies.
Good knowledge of web vulnerabilities and security.
Strong written and verbal communication skills.

semantic.text: We are a team of hard-working, fun-loving, and passionately driven thinkers and leaders focused on providing the best technical support for local and international brands. We believe in a non-hierarchical and collegial culture, fostering a cooperative and creative environment for each member to learn, grow and succeed. And we are excited to have you onboard!
Send us your resume to careers@amniltech.com to explore your career at Amnil Technologies.
